title: General
stimulusHtml:
2 points maximum

Translation (1 point): Fuga should be translated as “flight,” “fleeing,” or “escape” (must be rendered as a noun, not a verb); ignore any prepositions as it is the basic meaning we are after.

Identification (1 point): Ablative case (specific type doesn’t matter; ignore that information if provided)
descriptions:
Student response earns none of the available points.

Student response earns one of the available points.

Student response earns two of the available points.
